channel.title: How do I run a 508 HD client?
channel.description:
All I have got is the client, the cache and the server. They are all in seperate folders so what do I do to get it working?
I'm a noob. Please be friendly.
Thanks.

item.title: How do I run a 508 HD client?
item.dc:creator: @megaxx megaxx
item.description:
@megaxx wrote:

To run the server you need to go in your server’s folder, then open run.bat (or something like that). Then open your client. When you reach the login screen just choose any name and password you may want and start playing.

I’m not responsible for anything that can happen.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I run a 508 HD client?
